title: Hildegard Muntwyler, matriarch of the idiosyncratic Circus Monti – obituary
text:
Hildegard Muntwyler, who has died aged 83, was the quietly spoken matriarch of Switzerland’s Circus Monti, which celebrated its 35th anniversary in 2019, an enchanting and poetic alternative to the country’s largest outfit, the more conventional Circus Knie; with their air of whimsical eccentricity, Monti performances feel less like a standard circus show than a collection of sketches that incorporate physical comedy with elements of theatre and modern dance.
